name: recent_incidents
description: List recent review fraud incidents, optionally filtered by status. Use this to see what incidents need attention.

status.description: Filter by status: open, resolved, or all

limit.description: Maximum number of incidents to return

esql: FROM incidents | WHERE status == "{{ status }}" OR "{{ status }}" == "all" | SORT detected_at DESC | LIMIT {{ limit }} | KEEP incident_id, business_name, detected_at, severity, status, review_count
